stories.text:
Adyen is looking for Android Software Engineers.
ONSITE; Visa Services and Relocation Services are provided 
Hiring for several positions: 
Checkout team - working with libraries and SDKs for our merchants' Checkout pages
POS Android - working with dedicated devices, programming POS terminals 
Mobile Solutions - working on a new product that Adyen is preparing to roll out 
If interested, send me a message on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ilya-michurin-3558a521a/ 
Or apply directly at: https://careers.adyen.com/vacancies/development/3727966/android-software-engineer

stories.text:
Hey HN friends!

With a friend of mine from college we're starting a software factory and want to learn from the experiences that you may have. What things can a software factory do to provide a great customer experience?
